steps: Step 1 : Yarn hooked over the crochet hook.
Step 2 : Hook the yarn and pull through the loop on the crochet hook.
Step 3 : You should now just have one loop on the crochet hook.
Step 4 : Repeat this, counting along the way until you’ve created the starting chain long enough for the project you’re working on.
Step 5 : Once you’ve created the chain long enough, flip around so that you are now working from the right to the left again.
